fr.upmc.colins.farm3

Class DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.DistributedCVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI, fr.upmc.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class DistributedCVM
extends fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DistributedCVM contains the main used the launch the compute cluster simulation. This main use multiple JVM.

    Description

    This main supports the following components : core, admission control, request dispatcher, virtual machine.

    How to launch : https://i.imgur.com/ruuZ9ws.png

    Created on : jan. 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
